name: Shearless
overview:
Shearless is an online salon booking service that connects clientele to top stylists within 24 hours.

Shearless is an online appointment service offering consumers last-minute bookings with top talent in high-end salons. Participating salons post their openings within a 24-hour window, and users search among 15 exclusive services to book appointments that fit their same-day or next-day needs.

With consumersâ€™ everyday and special occasion needs in mind, Shearless offers appointments in these categories: haircut (womenâ€™s or menâ€™s), blowout, special event styling (up or down), all-over color (and cut), partial highlight (and cut), full highlight (and cut), keratin treatment (short-term or long-term), make-up application, and brow shaping. Stylists post availabilities under these specific services and name their rate â€“ often the regular rate, sometimes at a discount. No membership fee is required to use the Shearless booking service.

Shearless is currently available only in Nashville.
